results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,r) = number of maximum r-uniform acyclic hypergraphs of order n and size n-r+1.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for the first 50 rows

Wang, Jian-fang and Li, Hai-zhu, Enumeration of Maximum Acyclic Hypergraphs, Acta Mathematicae Applicatae Sinica,English Series, 2002 vol.18 number 2, page 215.
